page.title: 06A SALISBURY ENTERTAINER
page.content: {Charlie Knight}has built more than twenty-two crazy bikes. He built the first one in 1963 to entertain people.When he started to build his crazy bikes, people asked him to come to their fetes. He has been asked to do twenty-six television shows, including "That's Life" with Esther Rantzen. He won the television award for the craziest bike on television. The bike which won was called Jezebel. To ride Jezebel, you have to pedal backwards to go forwards, and when you turn the handlebars to the right, the bike turns left, and when you turn the handlebars to the left, the bike turns right. Only one or two people can ride her without falling off. Another bike is called 'Upsy', because the pedals are at the top with the handlebars, and the saddle is down below.
